allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Enhance quote animations and fix slide content blocking

Quote Banner Improvements:
- Smooth scale and translate animations (700ms duration)
- Elegant entrance with delayed fade-in
- Animated quote icon with rotation effect
- Added sparkle decoration with staggered animation
- Glow effect behind banner for depth
- Larger, more prominent styling (rounded-2xl)
- Better border and shadow effects
- Improved timing and easing

Slide Layout Fixes:
- Changed all slides from h-screen to min-h-screen
- Increased bottom padding from p-16 to pb-40 (160px)
- Prevents bottom navigation from blocking slide content
- Maintains horizontal and top padding (px-16 pt-16)
- Allows slides to grow beyond viewport if needed
- Content now properly visible above slide switcher

Benefits:
- Quotes appear with elegant, professional animations
- All slide content visible and accessible
- No content hidden behind navigation controls
- Flexible layout that adapts to content height
EOF
)")
